title: Chinese New Year tofu and pork ball soup (He jia tuan yuan)
ingredients: ['1 (396g) packet soft tofu', '200g minced pork', '6 tablespoons cornflour', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon chicken stock granules', '1 teaspoon salt', '1.2L water', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '10 dried prawns', '100g fresh pea vine shoots, trimmed', '1 teaspoon chicken stock granules', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
